comment: use rank to customize how the image will be shown
1. use (kind, value) pair to specify how frequently the pattern of image will be shown
the value of WEIGHT represents a selected weight; the value of PERCENTAGE represents a selected possibility
2. use period to constrain the time the pattern of image can appear, the format is hhmm-hhmm
rank用來設定圖片如何被呈現：
1. 可以(kind, value) pair來設定該圖片類型顯示的頻率
其中WEIGHT的value指明被選擇的權重，PERCENTAGE的value指明被選擇的機率
2. 可以period限制該圖片類型顯示的時間，格式為hhmm-hhmm
